thi-ap25:16.2: gatā → agaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | tato → gatā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap25:35.1: Na vañcakālo subhage → na pañhakālo subhage (bj); na pañhakālo subhaṇe (sya1ed, sya2ed); na pañhakālo subhage (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap25:42.3: Doḷālolāva → doḷālolā ca (bj); dāmāmālañca (sya1ed, sya2ed); dolālocā ca (pts-vp-pli1); dololullāva (mr)
thi-ap25:44.1: Vedimajjhāva sussoṇī → tanumajjhā puthussoṇī (bj); vedimajjhā puthussoṇi (sya1ed, sya2ed); vedimajjhā puthussoṇī (pts-vp-pli1)
